# datapower_gitopsvariables (Data Source)

GitOps variables (`default` domain only)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_gitopsvariables" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_gitopsvariables.test]
}
```

- `user_summary` (String) Comments
